ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] GM events
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The ones that stick out the most for me are: Firiona Vie fighting Cazic-Thule in Lesser Faydark. That one resulted in the zone having a red tinge for a
ygData.messageBody:
--- Mac <bigmaca3@...> wrote:
> Since we are in a story telling mood, and to get
> some things jump
> started, I though I'd ask this. Do you remember
> your first GM
> event? Or even the most memorable.
>

The ones that stick out the most for me are:

Firiona Vie fighting Cazic-Thule in Lesser Faydark.
That one resulted in the zone having a red tinge for a
while, and Estrielle (who used to be a good guy)
becoming Corrupted. After FV fell =( everyone went
back to Felwithe to see the king "knight" some of the
PC's that tried to help her.

Then there was the plague in North and West Karana,
where there was a green fog all the time and giant
beetles would swarm everyone.

I know there are more that I'm forgetting.... I'll
post them if I think of them.

=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
http://home.comcast.net/~melanieroark
